channel.title: SourceForge.net: SF.net Project News: OpenSharePoint Team Service (including full news text)
channel.description: SF.net Project News: OpenSharePoint Team Service (opensharepoint project) - A GNU license Intra/Extranet Portal Server just like Sharepoint Portal Server but have application client interface to a document repository (OpenDigital Assistant). This application can share user files (compressed format like : zip, tar, tar.gz, tgz)
channel.copyright: Copyright and acceptable usage information for this RSS may feed may be found at: http://sourceforge.net/docman/display_doc.php?docid=6048&group_id=1#licensing_and_other_terms

image.title: SourceForge.net logo
image.description: The world's largest Open Source software development website

item.title: OSP04 : Demo Server!!
item.description: This is a demo server for test OSP04 : http://www.acn.ac.th/~raziel/sharepoint_v4/ , i was upload a demo module like Document Library and Contact List and another modules 'll update soon. (1 comments)
item.author: redlinesoft@users.sourceforge.net (Anoochit Chalothorn)

item.title: OSP04 : New OSP04 Application Model!
item.description: I design a new OSP04 model, that should be a CMS and GroupWare (someone calling that),yeah it should be... but i didn't understand that why OSP like groupware and it should be a groupware,so i 've changed it, changed everything eg.: DB Connection , API and more feature (request) like document library permission, document search, user groups setting, contact group and more... (it also multi-langauge support ) now i have very best tranlators to Spain, English and Thai language thank you for all people who interested in this project! and thank you for all comment. (0 comments)
item.author: redlinesoft@users.sourceforge.net (Anoochit Chalothorn)

item.title: OSP04 'll release soon...
item.description: OpenSharePoint 0.4a should release at last year 2003 but some developers want to change features and some API eg: Multi-Language, Portable to another DBMS etc. so OSP04 'll release soon, thank you for interested. (0 comments)
item.author: redlinesoft@users.sourceforge.net (Anoochit Chalothorn)

item.title: Download : OpenSharePoint Team Service Version 0.3alpha
item.description: Download -> OpenSharePoint Team Service Version 0.3alpha at file section (0 comments)
